flows.name: current-death-counts-by-country
flows.query: SELECT * FROM [bigquery-public-data.covid19_jhu_csse.deaths] where country_region = '{param1}' and province_state is null LIMIT 1000

flows.name: cumulative-deaths-by-us-state
flows.query: SELECT state_name, deaths FROM [bigquery-public-data.covid19_nyt.us_states] where date = '{param1}' order by deaths desc LIMIT 1000
